text:
All traders and businesses have a legal responsibility to dispose their waste. 

If you're a trader or business, you should take your waste to a licensed commercial facility, arrange a collection or hire a skip. 

#dutyofcare #SCRAPflytipping

@harrietalvis @Blacky_Himself @EnvAgency You statement is so wrong I don‚Äôt know where to start. Investment post privatisation has been IMMENSE! STW, SPS, odour control, sludge treatment and disposal technology has changed beyond recognition. Sewerage design similarly. Targeted investment directed by legislation.

@harrietalvis @Blacky_Himself @EnvAgency Petition the government. Prior to 1989 they woefully under invested in the industry and since then they have legislated the industry to invest by using borrowed money from investors, who are surely entitled to a return for their investment?
